summary.span: Represents a point in time, typically expressed as a date and time of day, relative to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

span.span: Represents a point in time, typically expressed as a date and time of day, relative to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構包含值，一起屬性，定義目前差異執行個體的日期和時間與國際標準時間 (UTC)。The structure includes a value, together with an property that defines the difference between the current instance's date and time and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 因為它只會定義日期和時間相對於 UTC，結構未包含`Kind`成員，做為結構沒有。Because it exactly defines a date and time relative to UTC, the structure does not include a `Kind` member, as the structure does. 它代表下午 11:59:59，年 12 月 31 到西元 9999年日的日期和時間的 UTC 範圍從 12:00:00，年 1 月 1 日午夜 0001 如下 （一般紀元） 的值It represents dates and times with values whose UTC ranges from 12:00:00 midnight, January 1, 0001 Anno Domini (Common Era), to 11:59:59 P.M., December 31, 9999 A.D. (C.E.)。(C.E.). 時間元件的以 100 奈秒為單位稱為次滴答聲，則會測量值，且在特定日期的刻度數年 1 月 1，西元 0001年 12:00 午夜起The time component of a value is measured in 100-nanosecond units called ticks, and a particular date is the number of ticks since 12:00 midnight, January 1, 0001 A.D. (C.E.)在行事曆。(C.E.) in the calendar. A值一律表示在內容明確或預設的行事曆。A value is always expressed in the context of an explicit or default calendar. 所能歸因於 leap 秒的刻度未被納入的滴答總數。Ticks that are attributable to leap seconds are not included in the total number of ticks. > [!NOTE] > 如果您正在使用刻度值，您要轉換成某些其他時間間隔，例如分鐘或秒鐘，您應該使用， ， ， ，或常數，以執行轉換。If you are working with a ticks value that you want to convert to some other time interval, such as minutes or seconds, you should use the , , , , or constant to perform the conversion. 例如，若要加入的秒數表示所指定的刻度數元件值，您可以使用運算式`dateValue.Second + nTicks/Timespan.TicksPerSecond`。For example, to add the number of seconds represented by a specified number of ticks to the component of a value, you can use the expression `dateValue.Second + nTicks/Timespan.TicksPerSecond`. 雖然值都包含位移，則不是完全時區感知的資料結構。Although a value includes an offset, it is not a fully time zone-aware data structure. 一項特性的時區與 UTC 相差的時，它就無法明確地識別時區。While an offset from UTC is one characteristic of a time zone, it does not unambiguously identify a time zone. 不只執行多個時區共用相同的 UTC 位移，但如果它會遵守日光節約時間，單一的時區位移變更。Not only do multiple time zones share the same offset from UTC, but the offset of a single time zone changes if it observes daylight saving time. 這表示，只要值會與其時區解除關聯，它可以不會明確地連結回到其原始的時區。This means that, as soon as a value is disassociated from its time zone, it can no longer be unambiguously linked back to its original time zone. 因為為結構時，已宣告但未初始化的物件包含每個成員欄位的預設值。Because is a structure, a object that has been declared but not otherwise initialized contains the default values for each of its member fields. 這表示，其屬性設定為及其屬性設定為。This means that its property is set to and its property is set to . 您可以建立新藉由呼叫其建構函式，類似於的多載建構函式的多任何的載值結構。You can create a new value by calling any of the overloads of its constructor, which are similar to the overloaded constructors for the structure. 您也可以建立新藉由指定的值值。You can also create a new value by assigning it a value. 這是隱含的轉換。它不需要轉型運算子 （C# 中） 或呼叫轉換方法 （在 Visual Basic)。This is an implicit conversion; it does not require a casting operator (in C#) or call to a conversion method (in Visual Basic). 您也可以初始化值的字串表示的日期和時間，藉由呼叫靜態字串剖析方法，其包括許多從， ， ，和。You can also initialize a value from the string representation of a date and time by calling a number of static string parsing methods, which include , , , and . 成員結構提供下列方面的功能：The members of the structure provide functionality in the following areas: - 日期和時間運算。Date and time arithmetic. 您可以加入或減去的日期或時間間隔，從特定值。You can add or subtract either dates or time intervals from a particular value. 使用算術運算值，與具有不同的是時傳回的結果值，調整差異時間位移。Arithmetic operations with values, unlike those with values, adjust for differences in time offsets when returning a result. 例如，下列程式碼會使用變數来減去目前的當地時間，從目前的 UTC 時間。For example, the following code uses variables to subtract the current local time from the current UTC time. 然後程式碼會使用變數，以執行相同的作業。The code then uses variables to perform the same operation. 使用減法值與 utc 之間，傳回本地時區的差異，同時使用減法值傳回。The subtraction with values returns the local time zone's difference from UTC, while the subtraction with values returns . [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.Type#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Type/cs/Type.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.Type#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Type/vb/Type.vb#1)] - 類型的轉換作業。Type conversion operations. 您可以將轉換值值，反之亦然。You can convert values to values and vice versa. - 時間的操作和擷取作業。Time manipulation and extraction operations. 您可以擷取日期或時間值。You can extract either the date or the time of a value. 您也可以擷取特定的值元件，例如其年份或其月份。You can also retrieve the value of a particular component, such as its year or its month. - 日期和時間轉換。Date and time conversion. 您可以將任何轉換到另一個值值，表示相同的點，在另一個時區中的時間。You can convert any value to another value that represents the same point in time in another time zone. 不過，會套用時區調整規則只是方法，將轉換「 本機系統 」 區域中的日期和時間值。However, a time zone's adjustment rules are applied only in the case of the method, which converts a value to the date and time in the local system zone. - 日期和時間比較。Date and time comparison. 您可以判斷是否有任何特定值是早於、 同於或晚於另一個值。You can determine whether any particular value is earlier than, the same as, or later than another value. 執行比較之前，所有的值會轉換成 UTC。Before the comparison is performed, all values are converted to UTC.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用方法可在單一作業中加入一種以上的時間間隔 （天、 小時、 分鐘、 秒或毫秒為單位）。You can use the method to add more than one kind of time interval (days, hours, minutes, seconds, or milliseconds) in a single operation. 這個方法的行為等同於加法運算子。This method's behavior is identical to the addition operator. 結構也支援特殊的加法方法 (例如， ，和) 的每個時間間隔。The structure also supports specialized addition methods (such as , , and ) for each time interval. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法會傳回新物件。This method returns a new object. 不會修改目前物件的值加`timeSpan`其日期和時間。It does not modify the value of the current object by adding `timeSpan` to its date and time. 方法不會影響目前的值物件的屬性。The method does not affect the value of the current object's property. 因為物件不代表的日期和時間在特定的時區，方法不會考慮特定時區的調整規則的執行日期和時間運算時。Because a object does not represent the date and time in a specific time zone, the method does not consider a particular time zone's adjustment rules when it performs date and time arithmetic. 如果`timeSpan`參數是`null`，這個方法會傳回原始值物件保持不變。If the `timeSpan` parameter is `null`, this method returns the value of the original object unchanged. ## Examples 下列範例會建立的陣列代表飛行之間的時間目的地的物件。The following example creates an array of objects that represent the flight times between destinations. 方法接著會將這段時間以物件，表示班機的起飛初始時間。The method then adds these times to a object that represents a flight's initial takeoff time. 結果會反映排程的抵達時間會在每個目的地。The result reflects the scheduled arrival time at each destination. remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 檔案時間是 64 位元值，表示 12:00，年 1 月 1 西元 1601年日午夜起已經過的 100 奈秒間隔數A Windows file time is a 64-bit value that represents the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. (C.E.)國際標準時間 (UTC)。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). Windows 用來記錄應用程式建立、 存取，或寫入檔案時的檔案時間。Windows uses a file time to record when an application creates, accesses, or writes to a file. 藉由呼叫是透過 Windows API 直接存取 Windows 檔案時間`GetFileTime`函式，以傳回`FILETIME`結構。A Windows file time is directly accessible through the Windows API by calling the `GetFileTime` function, which returns a `FILETIME` structure. 單一函式參數是要擷取其檔案時間資訊的檔案控制代碼。The single function parameter is the handle of the file whose file time information is to be retrieved. 檔案控制代碼會擷取藉由呼叫`CreateFile`函式。The file handle is retrieved by calling the `CreateFile` function. `FILETIME`結構的`dwHighDateTime`成員包含四個高序位位元組的檔案時間，並將其`dwLowDateTime`成員包含四個低序位位元組。The `FILETIME` structure's `dwHighDateTime` member contains the four high-order bytes of the file time, and its `dwLowDateTime` member contains the four low-order bytes. 下列範例將說明如何擷取 Windows 檔案時間值，並將它們轉換成值。The example that follows illustrates how to retrieve Windows file time values and convert them to values. Windows 檔案時間值也可以建立從值藉由呼叫和方法，以及從值藉由呼叫方法。Windows file time values can also be created from values by calling the and methods, and from values by calling the method. ## Examples 下列範例會使用 Windows API 來擷取 WordPad 可執行檔的 Windows 檔案時間。The following example uses the Windows API to retrieve the Windows file times for the WordPad executable. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如有必要，屬性將目前物件的日期和時間為本機系統的日期和時間。If necessary, the property converts the current object's date and time to the local system's date and time. 轉換是兩個步驟作業：The conversion is a two-step operation: 1. 屬性會將目前物件的時間為國際標準時間 (UTC)。The property converts the current object's time to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 2. 屬性然後將轉換為本地時間的 UTC。The property then converts UTC to local time. 有沒有無效的時間和當地時區標準時間對應模稜兩可的時間。There are no invalid times and ambiguous times are mapped to the local zone's standard time. (不過，轉換可以建立異常狀況： 如果衍生自本機電腦的值反映模稜兩可的日期和時間，值可以轉換成 UTC，然後再回到不同於原始時間的本地時間。)執行這項轉換時，該屬性適用於任何以當地時區的調整規則。(However, the conversion can create an anomaly: if a value that is derived from the local computer reflects an ambiguous date and time, that value can be converted to UTC and then back to a local time that differs from the original time.) The property applies any adjustment rules in the local time zone when it performs this conversion. 這個屬性會傳回日期和時間元件的物件，使用於至轉換。This property returns both the date and the time component of a object, which makes it useful for to conversion. 除了執行任何所需的時間轉換，這個屬性與不同屬性的值設定屬性傳回之物件。In addition to performing any necessary time conversion, this property differs from the property by setting the value of the property of the returned object to . ## Examples 下列範例說明的幾個轉換值以本地時間，在美國太平洋時區太平洋標準時區。The following example illustrates several conversions of values to local times in the U.S. Pacific Standard Time zone. 請注意，最後三次所有模稜兩可。此屬性可讓它們全部對應到單一日期和時間在太平洋標準時間區域中。Note that the last three times are all ambiguous; the property maps all of them to a single date and time in the Pacific Standard Time zone. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個常數的值為 12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM + 00:00。The value of this constant is 12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM +00:00. 屬性用來判斷是否的新值物件或算術運算所傳回的值是相同於還是早於此最大範圍值。The property is used to determine whether the value of a new object or the value returned by an arithmetic operation is the same as or earlier than this maximum range value. 如果不存在，方法會擲回。If it is not, the method throws an . 任何值會轉換為國際標準時間 (UTC)，此方法會比較它與前。Any value is converted to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) before the method compares it with . 這表示值的日期和時間已接近最大的範圍，但其位移是負數，可能會擲回例外狀況。This means that a value whose date and time are close to the maximum range, but whose offset is negative, may throw an exception. 例如，值 12/31/9999 11:00 PM-02:00，超出範圍，因為它是一小時晚於時將它轉換成 UTC。For example, the value 12/31/9999 11:00 PM -02:00 is out of range because it is one hour later than when it is converted to UTC. 部分月曆，例如，支援早於上方的日期範圍。Some calendars, such as the , support an upper date range that is earlier than . 在這些情況下，嘗試存取指派變數或格式化和剖析作業可能會擲回。In these cases, trying to access in variable assignments or formatting and parsing operations can throw an . 而擷取的值不是，您可以擷取從指定的文化特性最有效的日期值的屬性。Instead of retrieving the value of , you can retrieve the value of the specified culture's latest valid date value from the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會剖析具有三個元素可以依任何順序出現，且以空白字元分隔的字串。 parses a string with three elements that can appear in any order and are delimited by white space. 這三個元素會在下表所示。These three elements are as shown in the following table. |元素Element|範例Example| |-------------|-------------| |\<日期 >\|"2/10/2007""2/10/2007"| |\<時間 >\|「 下午 1:02:03""1:02:03 PM"| |\\|"-7:30""-7:30"| 每個這些項目是選擇性的雖然\<位移 > 不能單獨出現。Although each of these elements is optional, \ cannot appear by itself. 它必須提供搭配 \<日期 > 或\<時間 >。It must be provided together with either \ or \. 如果\<日期 > 遺漏，其預設值是目前的日期。If \ is missing, its default value is the current day. 如果\<時間 > 遺漏，其預設值是 12:00:00 AM。If \ is missing, its default value is 12:00:00 AM. 如果\<日期 > 存在但其元件的組成只有兩位數的年份，它會轉換成目前的文化特性的現行曆法為基礎的值中之年屬性。If \ is present but its year component consists of only two digits, it is converted to a year in the current culture's current calendar based on the value of the property. 如果\<位移 > 遺漏，其預設值是當地時區位移。If \ is missing, its default value is the offset of the local time zone. \<位移 > 可以表示為負數或正數的位移與國際標準時間 (UTC)。\ can represent either a negative or a positive offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 在任一情況下，\<位移 > 必須包含正負號。In either case, \ must include a sign symbol. `input`所使用的格式設定資訊中剖析字串初始化目前的文化特性的物件。The `input` string is parsed by using the formatting information in a object that is initialized for the current culture. 若要剖析的字串，其中包含指定之格式設定不一定對應到目前的文化特性的格式，使用方法，並提供的格式規範。To parse a string that contains designated formatting that does not necessarily correspond to the formatting of the current culture, use the method and provide a format specifier. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫方法來剖析數個日期和時間的字串。The following example calls the method to parse several date and time strings. 此範例包含從 2007 年 3 月 22 日，輸出會在 en-us 文化特性的系統上-我們。The example includes output from March 22, 2007, on a system whose culture is en-us. [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.Parse#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Parse/cs/ParseExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.Parse#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Parse/vb/ParseExamples.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會剖析具有三個元素可以依任何順序出現，且以空白字元分隔的字串。This method parses a string with three elements that can appear in any order and are delimited by white space. 下表中，會顯示這三個元素。These three elements are shown in the following table. |元素Element|範例Example| |-------------|-------------| |\<日期 >\|"2/10/2007""2/10/2007"| |\<時間 >\|「 下午 1:02:03""1:02:03 PM"| |\\|"-7:30""-7:30"| 每個這些項目是選擇性的雖然\<位移 > 不能單獨出現。Although each of these elements is optional, \ cannot appear by itself. 它必須提供搭配 \<日期 > 或\<時間 >。It must be provided together with either \ or \. 如果\<日期 > 遺漏，其預設值是目前的日期。If \ is missing, its default value is the current day. 如果\<日期 > 存在但其元件的組成只有兩位數的年份，它會轉換成中之年`provider`參數的現行曆法為基礎的值屬性。If \ is present but its year component consists of only two digits, it is converted to a year in the `provider` parameter's current calendar based on the value of the property. 如果\<時間 > 遺漏，其預設值是 12:00:00 AM。If \ is missing, its default value is 12:00:00 AM. 如果\<位移 > 遺漏，其預設值是當地時區位移。If \ is missing, its default value is the offset of the local time zone. \<位移 > 可以表示為負數或正數的位移與國際標準時間 (UTC)。\ can represent either a negative or a positive offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 在任一情況下，\<位移 > 必須包含正負號。In either case, \ must include a sign symbol. 這三個元素的格式由所定義`formatProvider`參數，可以是下列其中一項：The format of these three elements is defined by the `formatProvider` parameter, which can be either of the following: - A物件，表示其格式設定中使用的文化特性`input`參數。A object that represents the culture whose formatting is used in the `input` parameter. 所傳回物件屬性會定義所使用的格式`input`。The object returned by the property defines the formatting used in `input`. - A物件，定義日期和時間資料的格式。A object that defines the format of date and time data. 如果`formatprovider`是`null`、使用對應至目前的文化特性的物件。If `formatprovider` is `null`, the object that corresponds to the current culture is used. 使用中的正或負號\<位移 > 必須是 + 或-。The positive or negative sign used in \ must be either + or -. 不由定義或屬性物件`formatProvider`參數。It is not defined by the or properties of the object of the `formatProvider` parameter. ## Examples 下列範例會剖析日期和時間的字串為 fr-fr 文化特性的格式設定和顯示它們使用本機系統的預設 en-us-文化特性。The following example parses date and time strings that are formatted for the fr-fr culture and displays them using the local system's default en-us culture. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法剖析字串表示法中所定義的格式必須是日期`format`參數。The method parses the string representation of a date, which must be in the format defined by the `format` parameter. 它也需要\<日期 >，\<時間 >，並\<位移 > 日期和時間的字串表示的項目會出現在所指定的順序`format`。It also requires that the \, \, and \ elements of the string representation of a date and time appear in the order specified by `format`. 如果`input`字串不符合這`format`參數，方法會擲回。If the `input` string does not match this `format` parameter, the method throws a . 相反地，方法剖析日期的任何一種格式提供者所辨識的格式的字串表示物件。In contrast, the method parses the string representation of a date in any one of the formats recognized by the format provider's object. 也可讓\<日期 >，\<時間 >，並\<位移 > 要以任何順序出現的日期和時間的字串表示的項目。 also allows the \, \, and \ elements of the string representation of a date and time to appear in any order. `format`參數是包含單一標準格式規範或一或多個自訂格式規範會定義所需的格式字串`input`參數。The `format` parameter is a string that contains either a single standard format specifier or one or more custom format specifiers that define the required format of the `input` parameter. 如需有效格式的程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)和[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For details about valid formatting codes, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). 如果`format`包含`z`， `zz`，或`zzz`自訂格式規範來指出位移必須存在於`input`，該時差必須包含負號或正號。If `format` includes the `z`, `zz`, or `zzz` custom format specifiers to indicate that an offset must be present in `input`, that offset must include either a negative sign or a positive sign. 如果正負號，方法會擲回。If the sign is missing, the method throws a . 如果`format`要求`input`包含日期而非時間，產生物件指派午夜的時間 (0: 00:00)。If `format` requires that `input` contain a date but not a time, the resulting object is assigned a time of midnight (0:00:00). 如果`format`要求`input`包含時間，但不是日期，產生物件指派本機系統上目前的日期。If `format` requires that `input` contain a time but not a date, the resulting object is assigned the current date on the local system. 如果`format`不需要`input`包含表示所產生的位移指派的本機系統時區時差的物件。If `format` does not require that `input` contain an offset, the resulting object is assigned the time zone offset of the local system. 特定日期和時間符號和使用的字串`input`會由`formatProvider`參數，因為是精確的格式`input`如果`format`是標準格式規範的字串。The particular date and time symbols and strings used in `input` are defined by the `formatProvider` parameter, as is the precise format of `input` if `format` is a standard format specifier string. `formatProvider`參數可以是下列其中一項：The `formatProvider` parameter can be either of the following: - A物件代表的文化特性，依據`input`解譯。A object that represents the culture based on which `input` is interpreted. 所傳回的物件及其屬性會定義符號與中的格式化`input`。The object returned by its property defines the symbols and formatting in `input`. - A物件，定義日期和時間資料的格式。A object that defines the format of date and time data. 如果`formatprovider`是`null`、使用對應至目前的文化特性的物件。If `formatprovider` is `null`, the object that corresponds to the current culture is used. ## Examples 下列範例會使用與標準和自訂格式規範和文化特性而異，剖析數個日期和時間字串的方法。The following example uses the method with standard and custom format specifiers and the invariant culture to parse several date and time strings. >，並\<位移 > 要以任何順序出現的日期和時間的字串表示的項目。 also allows the \, \, and \ elements of the string representation of a date and time to appear in any order. `format`參數是包含單一標準格式規範或一或多個自訂格式規範會定義所需的模式字串`input`參數。The `format` parameter is a string that contains either a single standard format specifier or one or more custom format specifiers that define the required pattern of the `input` parameter. specifiers to indicate that an offset must be present in `input`, that offset must include either a negative sign or a positive sign. 如果正負號，方法會擲回。If the sign is missing, the method throws a . 如果`format`要求`input`包含日期而非時間，產生物件指派午夜的時間 (0: 00:00)。If `format` requires that `input` contain a date but not a time, the resulting object is assigned a time of midnight (0:00:00). 如果`format`要求`input`包含時間，但不是日期，產生物件指派本機系統上目前的日期。If `format` requires that `input` contain a time but not a date, the resulting object is assigned the current date on the local system. 如果`format`不需要`input`包含位移時，所產生的位移物件取決於值`styles`參數。If `format` does not require that `input` contain an offset, the offset of the resulting object depends on the value of the `styles` parameter. 如果`styles`包含，當地時區位移指派給物件。If `styles` includes , the offset of the local time zone is assigned to the object. 如果`styles`包含，Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 位移或 + 00:00，指派給物件。If `styles` includes , the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) offset, or +00:00, is assigned to the object. 如果指定兩個值，則會使用當地時區位移。If neither value is specified, the offset of the local time zone is used. 特定日期和時間符號和使用的字串`input`會由`formatProvider`參數。The particular date and time symbols and strings used in `input` are defined by the `formatProvider` parameter. 也是如此的正確格式`input`，如果`format`是標準格式規範的字串。The same is true for the precise format of `input`, if `format` is a standard format specifier string. `formatProvider`參數可以是下列其中一項：The `formatProvider` parameter can be either of the following: - A物件代表的文化特性，依據`input`解譯。A object that represents the culture based on which `input` is interpreted. 所傳回物件屬性會定義符號與中的格式化`input`。The object returned by the property defines the symbols and formatting in `input`. - A物件，定義日期和時間資料的格式。A object that defines the format of date and time data. 如果`formatprovider`是`null`、使用對應至目前的文化特性的物件。If `formatprovider` is `null`, the object that corresponds to the current culture is used. `styles`參數會定義是否允許空白字元，輸入字串中指示沒有明確的位移元件的字串剖析的方式，並支援 UTC 轉換在剖析作業的一部分。The `styles` parameter defines whether white space is allowed in the input string, indicates how strings without an explicit offset component are parsed, and supports UTC conversion as part of the parsing operation. 所有成員列舉支援除了。All members of the enumeration are supported except . 下表列出支援的每個成員的效果。The following table it cannot appear as the single character in `format`.| |"U""U"|不支援。Not supported.| |"r""r"|將轉換物件以 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 並將它使用的自訂格式字串輸出`ddd, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss GMT`。Converts the object to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and outputs it using the custom format string `ddd, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss GMT`.| |"u""u"|將轉換UTC 的物件，並將輸出的格式`yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ`。Converts the object to UTC and outputs it using the format `yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ`.| 其餘的標準日期和時間格式規範的行為相同，但是方法一樣與方法。The remaining standard date and time format specifiers behave the same with the method as they do with the method. 這個方法會使用衍生自目前的文化特性格式資訊。This method uses formatting information derived from the current culture. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 下列範例會顯示主控台中使用每個標準日期和時間格式規範的物件。The following example displays a object to the console using each of the standard date and time format specifiers. 使用 en-us 格式化輸出的文化特性。The output is formatted by using the en-us culture. remarks.format: ## Remarks Unix 時間代表自 1970年以來所經過的秒數-01-01T00:00:00Z (January 1，1970，上午 12:00 utc)。Unix time represents the number of seconds that have elapsed since 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z (January 1, 1970, at 12:00 AM UTC). 它不會考量閏秒。It does not take leap seconds into account. 這個方法會傳回的 Unix 時間的毫秒數。This method returns the number of milliseconds in Unix time. 這個方法第一次會轉換成 UTC 的目前執行個體後再傳回它的 Unix 時間的毫秒數。This method first converts the current instance to UTC before returning the number of milliseconds in its Unix time. 變成 1970年以前的日期和時間值-01-01T00:00:00Z，這個方法會傳回負值。For date and time values before 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z, this method returns a negative value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載方法就像方法，但是它不會擲回例外狀況如果轉換失敗。This overload of the method is like the method, except that it does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. 它會剖析具有三個元素可以依任何順序出現，且以空白字元分隔的字串。It parses a string with three elements that can appear in any order and are delimited by white space. 下表中，會顯示這三個元素。These three elements are shown in the following table. |元素Element|範例Example| |-------------|-------------| |\<日期 >\|"2/10/2007""2/10/2007"| |\<時間 >\|「 下午 1:02:03""1:02:03 PM"| |\\|"-7:30""-7:30"| 每個這些項目是選擇性的雖然\<位移 > 不能單獨出現。Although each of these elements is optional, \ cannot appear by itself. 它必須提供搭配 \<日期 > 或\<時間 >。It must be provided together with either \ or \. 如果\<日期 > 遺漏，其預設值是目前的日期。If \ is missing, its default value is the current day. 如果\<日期 > 存在但其元件的組成只有兩位數的年份，它會轉換成目前的文化特性的現行曆法為基礎的值中之年屬性。If \ is present but its year component consists of only two digits, it is converted to a year in the current culture's current calendar based on the value of the property. 如果\<時間 > 遺漏，其預設值是 12:00:00 AM。If \ is missing, its default value is 12:00:00 AM. 如果\<位移 > 遺漏，其預設值是當地時區位移。If \ is missing, its default value is the offset of the local time zone. 如果\<位移 > 已存在，它可以表示為負數或正數位移與國際標準時間 (UTC)。If \ is present, it can represent either a negative or a positive offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 在任一情況下，\<位移 > 必須包含正負號或方法傳回`false`。In either case, \ must include a sign symbol or the method returns `false`. `input`所使用的格式設定資訊中剖析字串初始化目前的文化特性的物件。The `input` string is parsed by using the formatting information in a object initialized for the current culture. 若要剖析的字串，其中包含指定之格式設定不一定對應於目前的文化特性，使用方法，並提供的格式規範。To parse a string that contains designated formatting that does not necessarily correspond to that of the current culture, use the method and provide a format specifier. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫方法來剖析數個不同的日期和時間格式字串。The following example calls the method to parse several strings with various date and time formats. [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.TryParse/cs/TryParse.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.TryParse/vb/TryParse.vb#1)]

方法會剖析具有三個元素可以依任何順序出現，且以空白字元分隔的字串。The method parses a string with three elements that can appear in any order and are delimited by white space. 下表中，會顯示這三個元素。These three elements are shown in the following table. |元素Element|範例Example| |-------------|-------------| |\<日期 >\|"2/10/2007""2/10/2007"| |\<時間 >\|「 下午 1:02:03""1:02:03 PM"| |\\|"-7:30""-7:30"| 每個這些項目是選擇性的雖然\<位移 > 不能單獨出現。Although each of these elements is optional, \ cannot appear by itself. 它必須提供搭配 \<日期 > 或\<時間 >。It must be provided together with either \ or \. 如果\<日期 > 遺漏，其預設值是目前的日期。If \ is missing, its default value is the current day. 如果\<日期 > 存在但其元件的組成只有兩位數的年份，它會轉換成中之年`provider`參數的現行曆法為基礎的值屬性。If \ is present but its year component consists of only two digits, it is converted to a year in the `provider` parameter's current calendar based on the value of the property. 如果\<時間 > 遺漏，其預設值是 12:00:00 AM。If \ is missing, its default value is 12:00:00 AM. 如果\<位移 > 遺漏，其預設值是當地時區位移或如果或該值會以指定`styles`。If \ is missing, its default value is the offset of the local time zone, or if either the or value is specified in `styles`. 如果\<位移 > 已存在，它可以表示為負數或正數位移與國際標準時間 (UTC)。If \ is present, it can represent either a negative or a positive offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 在任一情況下，\<位移 > 必須包含正負號或方法傳回`false`。In either case, \ must include a sign symbol or the method returns `false`. `input`使用中的特定文化特性格式資訊來剖析字串提供的物件`formatProvider`參數。The `input` string is parsed by using the culture-specific formatting information in a object supplied by the `formatProvider` parameter. `formatProvider`參數可以是下列其中一項：The `formatProvider` parameter can be either of the following: - A物件，表示其格式設定中使用的文化特性`input`。A object that represents the culture whose formatting is used in `input`. 所傳回物件屬性定義中使用的格式`input`。The object returned by the property defines the format that is used in `input`. - A物件，定義日期和時間資料的格式。A object that defines the format of date and time data. 此外，每個項目可以用前置或尾端空格來分隔和\<日期 > 和\<時間 > 元件可包含內部的泛空白字元 （例如 6: 00:00)。In addition, each element can be delimited by leading or trailing white space, and the \ and \ components can include inner white space (such as 6: 00:00). 只有\<位移 > 元件不能包含內部空格。Only the \ component cannot include inner white space. 如果`provider`是`null`、使用對應至目前的文化特性的物件。If `provider` is `null`, the object that corresponds to the current culture is used. 使用中的正或負號\<位移 > 必須是 + 或-。The positive or negative sign used in \ must be either + or -. 不由定義或屬性所傳回物件`formatprovider`參數的屬性。It is not defined by the or properties of the object returned by the `formatprovider` parameter's property. 下列成員的列舉支援：The following members of the enumeration are supported: |DateTimeStyles 成員DateTimeStyles Member|註解Comments| |---------------------------|--------------| ||剖析字串，由`input`而且，如果有必要，將它轉換成 UTC。Parses the string represented by `input` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC. 它相當於剖析字串，並呼叫傳回的物件方法。It is equivalent to parsing a string, and then calling the returned object's method.| ||雖然有效，但會忽略此值。Although valid, this value is ignored. 在 允許內部空白字元\<日期 > 和\<時間 > 元件。Inner white space is allowed in the \ and \ components.| ||雖然有效，但會忽略此值。Although valid, this value is ignored. 剖析字串中的每個元件之前，可以使用前置空白字元。Leading white space is allowed in front of each component in the parsed string.| ||雖然有效，但會忽略此值。Although valid, this value is ignored. 剖析字串中的每個元件之前，允許使用尾端泛空白字元。Trailing white space is allowed in front of each component in the parsed string.| ||這是預設行為。This is the default behavior. 無法藉由提供更具限制性覆寫列舉值，例如。It cannot be overridden by supplying a more restrictive enumeration value, such as .| ||表示如果`input`參數缺少\<位移 > 項目，應該提供的當地時區位移。Indicates that, if the `input` parameter lacks an \ element, the offset of the local time zone should be provided. 這是預設行為的方法。This is the default behavior of the method.| ||表示如果`input`參數缺少\<位移 > 項目，應該提供 UTC 時差 (00:00)。Indicates that, if the `input` parameter lacks an \ element, the UTC offset (00:00) should be provided.| ||雖然有效，但此值會被忽略，而且沒有任何作用。Although valid, this value is ignored and has no effect.| ||因為結構未包含`Kind`屬性，這個值就沒有作用。Because the structure does not include a `Kind` property, this value has no effect.| 只有不支援值。Only the value is not supported. 中包含這個值會擲回`styles`參數。An is thrown if this value is included in the `styles` parameter. ## Examples remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載方法就像方法，不同之處在於此方法不會擲回例外狀況如果轉換失敗。This overload of the method is like the method, except that this method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. 它會剖析的日期和時間，必須完全符合指定模式的字串表示`format`參數。It parses the string representation of a date and time that must exactly match the pattern specified by the `format` parameter. 如果`input`字串不符合此模式中，有一些可能的變化，所定義的泛空白字元`styles`參數時，剖析作業會失敗，而且方法會傳回`false`。If the `input` string does not match this pattern, with some possible variations in white space defined by the `styles` parameter, the parsing operation fails and the method returns `false`. `format`參數是包含單一標準格式規範或一或多個自訂格式規範會定義所需的模式字串`input`。The `format` parameter is a string that contains either a single standard format specifier or one or more custom format specifiers that define the required pattern of `input`. 如需有效格式的程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)和[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For details about valid formatting codes, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). 如果`format`包含`z`， `zz`，或`zzz`自訂格式規範來指出位移必須存在於`input`，該時差必須包含負號或正號。If `format` includes the `z`, `zz`, or `zzz` custom format specifiers to indicate that an offset must be present in `input`, that offset must include either a negative sign or a positive sign. 如果正負號遺漏，剖析作業失敗，而且方法會傳回`false`。If the sign is missing, the parsing operation fails and the method returns `false`. 如果`format`要求`input`包含日期而非時間，產生物件指派午夜的時間 (0: 00:00)。If `format` requires that `input` contain a date but not a time, the resulting object is assigned a time of midnight (0:00:00). 如果`format`要求`input`包含時間，但不是日期，產生物件指派本機系統上目前的日期。If `format` requires that `input` contain a time but not a date, the resulting object is assigned the current date on the local system. 如果`format`不需要`input`包含位移時，所產生的位移物件取決於值`styles`參數。If `format` does not require that `input` contain an offset, the offset of the resulting object depends on the value of the `styles` parameter. 如果`styles`包含，當地時區位移指派給物件。If `styles` includes , the offset of the local time zone is assigned to the object. 如果`styles`包含，Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 位移或 + 00:00，指派給物件。If `styles` includes , the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) offset, or +00:00, is assigned to the object. 如果指定兩個值，則會使用當地時區位移。If neither value is specified, the offset of the local time zone is used. 特定日期和時間符號和使用的字串`input`會由`formatProvider`參數。The particular date and time symbols and strings used in `input` are defined by the `formatProvider` parameter. 也是如此的精確模式`input`如果`format`是標準格式規範的字串。The same is true for the precise pattern of `input` if `format` is a standard format specifier string. `formatProvider`參數可以是下列其中一項：The `formatProvider` parameter can be either of the following: - A物件代表的文化特性，依據`input`解譯。A object that represents the culture based on which `input` is interpreted. 所傳回物件屬性會定義符號，且標準格式接受`input`。The object returned by the property defines the symbols and standard formats allowed in `input`. - A物件，定義日期和時間資料的格式。A object that defines the format of date and time data. 如果`formatprovider`是`null`、使用對應至目前的文化特性的物件。If `formatprovider` is `null`, the object that corresponds to the current culture is used. `styles`參數會定義是否允許空白字元，輸入字串中指示沒有明確的位移元件的字串剖析的方式，並支援 UTC 轉換在剖析作業的一部分。The `styles` parameter defines whether white space is allowed in the input string, indicates how strings without an explicit offset component are parsed, and supports UTC conversion as part of the parsing operation. 所有成員列舉支援除了。All members of the enumeration are supported except . 下表列出支援的每個成員的效果。The following table lists the effect of each supported member. |`DateTimeStyles` 成員`DateTimeStyles` member|行為Behavior| |-----------------------------|--------------| ||剖析`input`而且，如果有必要，將它轉換成 UTC。Parses `input` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC. 它相當於剖析字串，然後再呼叫方法傳回之物件。It is equivalent to parsing a string, and then calling the method of the returned object.| ||如果`format`不需要`input`位移值，傳回物件會得到的當地時區位移。If `format` does not require that `input` contain an offset value, the returned object is given the offset of the local time zone. 這是預設行為。This is the default behavior.| ||如果`format`不需要`input`位移值，傳回物件會得到在 UTC 時差 （+ 00:00）。If `format` does not require that `input` contain an offset value, the returned object is given the UTC offset (+00:00).| ||可讓`input`來包含內部不格式所指定的泛空白字元。Allows `input` to include inner white space not specified by format. 額外的空白字元可以出現的日期和時間的元件之間，以及內位移以外的個別元件，剖析字串時，會忽略。Extra white space can appear between date and time components and within individual components, other than the offset, and is ignored when parsing the string.| ||可讓`input`包含未指定的前置空格`format`。Allows `input` to include leading spaces not specified by `format`. 剖析字串時，會忽略這些項目。These are ignored when parsing the string.| ||可讓`input`包含尾端空白不由指定`format`。Allows `input` to include trailing spaces not specified by `format`. 剖析字串時，會忽略這些項目。These are ignored when parsing the string.| ||可讓`input`加入不由指定的前置、 尾端，與內部空白`format`。Allows `input` to include leading, trailing, and inner spaces not specified by `format`. 中未指定的所有額外泛空白字元`format`剖析字串時，會被忽略。All extra white-space characters not specified in `format` are ignored when parsing the string.| ||表示中不允許其他空白字元`input`。Indicates that additional white space is not permitted in `input`. 空白字元必須出現在指定的完全相同中`format`。White space must appear exactly as specified in `format`. 這是預設行為。This is the default behavior.| ||沒有任何作用，因為結構未包含`Kind`屬性。Has no effect, because the structure does not include a `Kind` property.| ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法並有標準和自訂格式規範，而異的文化特性，以及各種剖析數個日期和時間字串的值。The following example uses the method with standard and custom format specifiers, the invariant culture, and various values to parse several date and time strings. more custom format specifiers that define the possible pattern of `input`. 如需有效格式的程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)和[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For details about valid formatting codes, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). 如果中的相符項目`formats`包含`z`， `zz`，或`zzz`自訂格式規範來指出位移必須存在於`input`，該時差必須包含負號或正號。If the matched element in `formats` includes the `z`, `zz`, or `zzz` custom format specifiers to indicate that an offset must be present in `input`, that offset must include either a negative sign or a positive sign. 如果遺漏符號，剖析作業會失敗而且方法會傳回`false`。If the sign is missing, the parse operation fails and the method returns `false`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用`formats`的這個多載來指定多個格式的參數可協助您減少許多使用者遇到進入日期和時間時的不便。Using the `formats` parameter of this overload to specify multiple formats can help reduce the frustration many users experience when they enter dates and times. 特別是，能夠定義多個輸入的模式可讓應用程式處理可以包括或是缺少中幾個月、 天、 小時、 分鐘和秒的前置零的日期和時間表示。In particular, the ability to define multiple input patterns enables an application to handle date and time representations that can either include or lack leading zeros in months, days, hours, minutes, and seconds. 這個範例將提供這個說明。The example provides an illustration of this. 如果中的相符項目`formats`要求`input`包含日期而非時間，產生物件指派午夜的時間 (0: 00:00)。If the matched element in `formats` requires that `input` contain a date but not a time, the resulting object is assigned a time of midnight (0:00:00). 如果中的相符項目`formats`需要輸入包含一次，但不是日期，產生物件指派本機系統上目前的日期。If the matched element in `formats` requires that input contain a time but not a date, the resulting object is assigned the current date on the local system. 如果中的相符項目`formats`不需要`input`包含位移時，所產生的位移物件取決於值`styles`參數。If the matched element in `formats` does not require that `input` contain an offset, the offset of the resulting object depends on the value of the `styles` parameter. 如果`styles`包含，當地時區位移指派給物件。If `styles` includes , the offset of the local time zone is assigned to the object. 如果`styles`包含，Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 位移或 + 00:00，指派給物件。If `styles` includes , the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) offset, or +00:00, is assigned to the object. 如果指定兩個值，則會使用當地時區位移。If neither value is specified, the offset of the local time zone is used. 特定日期和時間符號和使用的字串`input`會由`formatProvider`參數。The particular date and time symbols and strings used in `input` are defined by the `formatProvider` parameter. 也是如此的精確模式`input`如果的相符項目`formats`是標準格式規範的字串。The same is true for the precise pattern of `input` if the matching element of `formats` is a standard format specifier string. `formatProvider`參數可以是下列其中一項：The `formatProvider` parameter can be either of the following: - A物件代表的文化特性，依據`input`解譯。A object that represents the culture based on which `input` is interpreted. 所傳回物件屬性會定義符號與中的格式化`input`。The object returned by the property defines the symbols and formatting in `input`. - A物件，定義日期和時間資料的格式。A object that defines the format of date and time data. 如果`formatprovider`是`null`、使用對應至目前的文化特性的物件。If `formatprovider` is `null`, the object that corresponds to the current culture is used. `styles`參數會定義是否允許空白字元，輸入字串中指示沒有明確的位移元件的字串剖析的方式，並支援 UTC 轉換在剖析作業的一部分。The `styles` parameter defines whether white space is permitted in the input string, indicates how strings without an explicit offset component are parsed, and supports UTC conversion as part of the parsing operation. 所有成員列舉支援除了。All members of the enumeration are supported except . 下表列出支援的每個成員的效果。The following table lists the effect of each supported member. |`DateTimeStyles` 成員`DateTimeStyles` member|行為Behavior| |-----------------------------|--------------| ||剖析`input`而且，如果有必要，將它轉換成 UTC。Parses `input` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC. 它相當於剖析字串，然後再呼叫方法傳回之物件。It is equivalent to parsing a string, and then calling the method of the returned object.| ||如果中的相符項目`formats`不需要`input`位移值，傳回物件會得到的當地時區位移。If the matched element in `formats` does not require that `input` contain an offset value, the returned object is given the offset of the local time zone. 這是預設值。This is the default value.| ||如果中的相符項目`formats`不需要`input`位移值，傳回物件會得到在 UTC 時差 （+ 00:00）。If the matched element in `formats` does not require that `input` contain an offset value, the returned object is given the UTC offset (+00:00).| ||可讓`input`包括中的項目未指定的內部空白字元`formats`。Allows `input` to include inner white space not specified by the elements in `formats`. 額外的空白字元的日期和時間元件之間以及在個別的元件 （除了位移） 中可出現，且剖析字串時，會忽略。Extra white space can appear between date and time components and within individual components (except for the offset) and is ignored when parsing the string.| ||可讓`input`包含前置空格中的項目未指定`formats`。Allows `input` to include leading spaces not specified by the elements in `formats`. 剖析字串時，會忽略這些項目。These are ignored when parsing the string.| ||可讓`input`包含尾端空白中的項目未指定`formats`。Allows `input` to include trailing spaces not specified by the elements in `formats`. 剖析字串時，會忽略這些項目。These are ignored when parsing the string.| ||可讓`input`包含前置、 尾端，與內部空間中的項目未指定`formats`。Allows `input` to include leading, trailing, and inner spaces not specified by the elements in `formats`. 中的相符項目中未指定的所有額外泛空白字元`formats`剖析字串時，會被忽略。All extra white-space characters not specified in the matched element in `formats` are ignored when parsing the string.| ||表示中不允許其他空白字元`input`。Indicates that additional white space is not permitted in `input`. 空白字元必須出現在指定的完全相同中特定項目`formats`成功比對會發生。White space must appear exactly as specified in a particular element in `formats` for a successful match to occur. 這是預設行為。This is the default behavior.| ||沒有任何作用，因為結構未包含`Kind`屬性。Has no effect because the structure does not include a `Kind` property.| ## Examples 下列範例會定義多個輸入的格式字串表示的日期與時間和位移的值，並接著會將使用者輸入的字串傳遞方法。The following example defines multiple input formats for the string representation of a date and time and offset value, and then passes the string that is entered by the user to the method. summary.span: Gets a value that represents the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) date and time of the current object.

span.span: Gets a value that represents the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) date and time of the current object.

value.span: 目前的時間與國際標準時間 (UTC) 日期物件。

span.span: The Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) date and time of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會執行雙重轉換：The property performs a dual conversion: - 它會將轉換的日期和時間的目前物件以 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)。It converts the date and time of the current object to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 轉換由減去的值執行屬性從目前的時間與日期物件。The conversion is performed by subtracting the value of the property from the date and time of the current object. - 它會轉換值設定為值。It converts the value to a value. 屬性傳回之值設定為。The property of the returned value is set to . 擷取的值屬性就相當於呼叫目前物件的`ToUniversalTime.DateTime`屬性，不同處在於屬性，後者值是。Retrieving the value of the property is equivalent to calling the current object's `ToUniversalTime.DateTime` property, except that the property of the latter value is . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示值和其相對應的 UTC 時間。The following example shows how to use of the property to display a value and its corresponding UTC time. [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.Properties#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Properties/cs/Properties.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.Properties#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Properties/vb/Properties.vb#17)]

summary.span: Gets a object whose date and time are set to the current Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) date and time and whose offset is .

span.span: Gets a object whose date and time are set to the current Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) date and time and whose offset is .

value.span: 其日期和時間的物件是目前的國際標準時間 (UTC)，而位移為。

span.span: An object whose date and time is the current Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and whose offset is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會計算目前全球定位時間 (UTC) 在本機系統時鐘時間為基礎並由本機系統時區位移。The property computes the current Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) based on the local system's clock time and an offset defined by the local system's time zone. 目前的 UTC 時間的毫秒數元件的精確度會根據系統時鐘的解析度而定。The precision of the current UTC time's millisecond component depends on the resolution of the system clock. 在 Windows NT 3.5 （含） 更新版本和 Windows Vista 作業系統中，時鐘的解析度是大約為 10-15 毫秒。On Windows NT 3.5 and later, and Windows Vista operating systems, the clock's resolution is approximately 10-15 milliseconds. ## Examples 下列範例說明 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 與本地時間之間的關聯性。The following example illustrates the relationship between Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and local time. [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.Properties#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Properties/cs/Properties.cs#18)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.Properties#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Properties/vb/Properties.vb#18)]

summary.span: Gets the number of ticks that represents the date and time of the current object in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

span.span: Gets the number of ticks that represents the date and time of the current object in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

value.span: 中的刻度數物件的國際標準時間 (UTC)。

span.span: The number of ticks in the object's Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性表示 0001 年 1 月 1 日 12:00:00 午夜起已經過的 100 奈秒間隔數 (值)。The value of the property represents the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 12:00:00 midnight on January 1, 0001 (the value of ). 它不包含會加入閏秒的刻度。It does not include ticks that would be added by leap seconds. 奈秒是一個十億分之一秒;第二個有十個百萬個刻度。A nanosecond is one billionth of a second; there are ten million ticks in a second. 值屬性範圍從`DateTimeOffset.MinValue.Ticks`至`DateTimeOffset.MaxValue.Ticks`。The value of the property ranges from `DateTimeOffset.MinValue.Ticks` to `DateTimeOffset.MaxValue.Ticks`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性的值不受影響屬性。The property is not affected by the value of the property. 您也可以建立的字串表示法藉由呼叫物件的年份元件與"y"、"yy"或"yyyy"自訂格式規範的方法。You can also create a string representation of a object's year component by calling the method with the "y", "yy", or "yyyy" custom format specifiers. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的年份元件四種不同方式中的值：The following example displays the year component of a value in four different ways: - 所擷取的值屬性。By retrieving the value of the property. - 藉由呼叫使用"y"格式規範的方法。By calling the method with the "y" format specifier. - 藉由呼叫使用"yy"格式規範的方法。By calling the method with the "yy" format specifier. - 藉由呼叫以"yyyy"格式規範的方法。By calling the method with the "yyyy" format specifier.
